column2: I'm super confused why this place has great reviews. The staff and all the people that work here are great and very very nice. BUT - the food so extremely extremely bad. Almost gross
column3: we got the steak and eggs (extremely rancid smelling and the steak couldn't be called steak). The Sandwich was extremely bad mainly just a hunk of ham. The tator tots dish was mediocre it was basically Sonic. I'm disappointed that this place has been very very unrealistically hyped. Extreme waste of money and time.
